rComments: Z is great! She is passionate and knowledgable. She is super approachable and everyone should go to her office hours. However, while she is open to suggestions and lectures are well structured they can be a little dry because she spends the entire lecture talking.
She understands a variety of policy issues.  She is a decent lecturer, but her slides are repetitive and too general to study from.  She will also call the class out if everyone continues to talk.

Great professor. She really knows her stuff, her research is compelling, and she is more about you thinking for yourself based on the information she gave you than trying to make you memorize or state her opinions. Go to class! Go to her office hours as she speaks too fast to note sometimes. She loves it when people participate too. No book!

Z is a great teacher! she puts her lecture slides online, but there is a lot of supplemental info you can only get by going to class. class time goes quickly, but she spends the whole time talking so make sure you keep up.  she's also extremely helpful! she loves when people go to her office hours - it'll get you on her good side!
I thought the class was really interesting, since my focus is water policy. She is very approachable. The midterm and final are very straight foward,just read all the readings and you will do great.
Great teach!  Very helpful and accessible.

Z is a great teacher and I actually really liked her because she had attitude.  She has a tendency to be a little self righteous though.  The class information was very relevant to my focus in policy and the reading was informational.  The exams are written to be all essay answers so there is no way to BS.  Take notes and do readings.

Z seems great on the first day, shes clever, interesting, and got lots of information. By the second week you realize that her talking never stops and you're not really getting what she's talking about. The material for the class is bland at times and although very open to suggestions and avail. to help, Z spends the entire class time taaaaaalking.
